title: Types Of Covid-19 Treatment
content:
Preventing COVID-19
COVID-19 Vaccines
A COVID-19 vaccine is the first step to prevent severe health outcomes. Antiviral treatments are not a replacement for COVID-19 vaccinations.
COVID-19 vaccines available in the United States effectively protect people from getting seriously ill, being hospitalized, and even dying. As with vaccines for other diseases, you are protected best when you
stay up to date.
Where to find free COVID-19 vaccines this season
